a significant step back to superstardom: His first endorsement deal since his return to the NFL in 2009. The deal is with Unequal Technologies, a company that makes football pads Michael Vick used this season. Ben Roethlisberger will beat you up. I've never seen a guy take the hits he can take and also make people miss the way he doe and be as accurate on the run. The three-way decision process at Google was never depicted as a cozy session of like-minded individuals all on the same page; apparently the trio decided on a more conventional organization chart.
